attributes.action: Take greater steps to prevent weapon related offences and protect the Public and Police.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
1) To increase sentancing for knife related offences, such as mandatory custodial sentances for 2nd or 3rd offences.

2) To allow suitably trained officers to deploy routinely with firearms on the street. This is for their protection and that of the Public, as well as a visible deterrent.
